english_example_sentence: If we had touched the old, dusty box, we could have found a treasure.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы мы прикоснулись к старой, пыльной коробке, мы могли бы найти сокровище.
turkish_example_sentence: Eski, tozlu kutuya dokunmuş olsaydık, bir hazine bulabilirdik.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Eski, tozlu kutuya ______, bir hazine bulabilirdik.
